column4: Having hard drive issues, need to reinstall, AND save files. How do I mount my normal partition to save the files, when it says: mount: can't find /dev/sda1 in /etc/fstab or /etc/mtab
What does: mount: can't find /dev/sda1 in /etc/fstab or /etc/mtab mean, and how do I fix it
you need to specify a mount point either in your mount command or in /etc/fstab
Like how
